import AdminSidebar from "../../adminSideBar/AdminSidebar" import {useGetAllMenusQuery,useAddNewMenuMutation, useDeleteMenuMutation, useUpdateMenuMutation} from "../../../../features/manageMenuApi" import { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import routeNames from "../../../../routes" import { toast } from 'react-toastify' import Swal from 'sweetalert2' import { Modal } from "react-bootstrap" const Menu = ()=>{ const [editItem, setEditItem] = useState({ title:'' }) const [show,setShow] = useState(false) const [modalShow,setModalShow] = useState(false) const navigate = useNavigate() const {data,error,isLoading} = useGetAllMenusQuery() if( error && error.data.type === "permissionError"){ toast.warning(error.data.msg) navigate(routeNames.admin) } const [addNew] = useAddNewMenuMutation() const [updateMenu] = useUpdateMenuMutation() const [deleteData] = useDeleteMenuMutation() const menuData = { title:'', } const [menu,setMenu] = useState(menuData) const submitFrom = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() addNew(menu).then((response)=>{ if(response.data.type === 'success'){ toast.success(response.data.msg) } }) } const remove = (id) => { Swal.fire({ title: 'Are you sure?', text: "You won't be able to revert this!", icon: 'warning', showCancelButton: true, confirmButtonColor: '#3085d6', cancelButtonColor: '#d33', confirmButtonText: 'Yes, delete it!' }).then((result) => { if (result.isConfirmed) { deleteData(id).then((response)=>{ if(response.data.type === 'success'){ Swal.fire( 'Deleted!', `${response.data.msg}`, 'success' ) }else{ Swal.fire( 'error', 'There is a problem', 'error' ) } }) } }) } const handelModalShow = (menu)=>{ setEditItem(menu) setModalShow(true) } const hideShowModal = ()=>{ setModalShow(false) } const saveEditedData = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() updateMenu(editItem).then((response)=>{ console.log(response) if(response.data.type === 'success'){ toast.success(response.data.msg) } }) } return (
This is fine
Edit Menu
saveEditedData(e)} >
setEditItem({...editItem,title:e.target.value})} />
{show?
Create New Menu
submitFrom(e)} >
setMenu({...menu,title:e.target.value})} />
:}
Menu List
{ data && data.data.map((item,index)=>( )) }
# Name Menu Link Action
{index+1} {item.title} {item.order} Link handelModalShow(item)} className=" eye-edit"> remove(item._id)}>
) } export default Menu
